attributes.action: Give all security a pay rise
attributes.additional_details:
Security are one of many people
Who are forgotten during this pandemic they are risking there life’s to go to work and risking the family they live with when returning home from work , many don’t have cars or bikes to use so have to risk getting on London transport and many have to risk there lives when dealing with people who cause a threat at there work place
attributes.background:
To give all security a pay rise , they risk there selfs to go to work 
Looking after company building offices or estates and still doing it in a professional way while the COVID-19 lurks around them

rejection.details:
Unless security staff are directly employed in the public sector their pay is determined through their contract with their employer, subject to legislation on minimum wage.

We have published a number of petitions calling on the Government to reward key workers in light of Covid-19, which you might like to sign:

Identify and reward all key workers due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308903

Consider how to compensate key workers for their efforts during Covid-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308172

Make hazard pay mandatory for key workers in the midst of COVID 19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

Give all key workers a 100% tax and Nat. Ins. holiday through COVID-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

Pay bonus to all key workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

Pay Key Workers 2 weeks full pay if they have to isolate: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309104
